item.title: Ford CEO Jim Farley Says Buyers Prefer $30,000 EVs Over $75,000 Utility Vehicles: Report
item.description: Farley also added that Ford does not want to live under the shadow of Tesla, after having played the “No. 2” role to the latter for three years.

item.title: Tesla Hikes Model Y And Model 3 Lease Prices In US After EV Tax Credit Expiry
item.description: The EV giant raised the lease price on its best-selling Model Y SUV to the range of $529 to $599 per month.

item.title: Dow Futures Fall As US Government Shuts Down: NKE, LAC, OXY, ARM Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures were down by 0.49% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures fell 0.56%.
